remarks: induction step for the proof of ~ fmuldfeq .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
statement:
fmuldfeqlem1.1 $e |- F/ f ph $.
fmuldfeqlem1.2 $e |- F/ g ph $.
fmuldfeqlem1.3 $e |- F/_ t Y $.
fmuldfeqlem1.5 $e |- P = ( f e. Y , g e. Y |-> ( t e. T |-> ( ( f ` t ) x. ( g ` t ) ) ) ) $.
fmuldfeqlem1.6 $e |- F = ( t e. T |-> ( i e. ( 1 ... M ) |-> ( ( U ` i ) ` t ) ) ) $.
fmuldfeqlem1.7 $e |- ( ph -> T e. _V ) $.
fmuldfeqlem1.8 $e |- ( ph -> U : ( 1 ... M ) --> Y ) $.
fmuldfeqlem1.9 $e |- ( ( ph /\ f e. Y /\ g e. Y ) -> ( t e. T |-> ( ( f ` t ) x. ( g ` t ) ) ) e. Y ) $.
fmuldfeqlem1.10 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( 1 ... M ) ) $.
fmuldfeqlem1.11 $e |- ( ph -> ( N + 1 ) e. ( 1 ... M ) ) $.
fmuldfeqlem1.12 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( seq 1 ( P , U ) ` N ) ` t ) = ( seq 1 ( x. , ( F ` t ) ) ` N ) ) $.
fmuldfeqlem1.13 $e |- ( ( ph /\ f e. Y ) -> f : T --> RR ) $.
fmuldfeqlem1 $p |- ( ( ph /\ t e. T ) -> ( ( seq 1 ( P , U ) ` ( N + 1 ) ) ` t ) = ( seq 1 ( x. , ( F ` t ) ) ` ( N + 1 ) ) ) $.
